name: Scarpa Inverno Mountaineering Double Boots - Men's
description: Two stiffnesses of plastic are used to provide rigidity and flexibility for mountaineering and ice-climbing. The soft Pebax shell will not stiffen up in cold weather, and the inner liner features a warm, lace-up liner.Fully rigid boot with a hinged Pebax® nylon shell that stays flexible in cold temps.Included liner is 4-6mm thick. Expedition liner (6-8mm) is available separately.Relatively high volume toe box.Shock-absorbing heel insert.Cork insole for added insulation.Removable footbed.Sole rocker allows for comfortable walking and it uses a durable Vibram® rubber outsole.
